issues.message: Rename class 'FSMBase' to match pascal case naming rules, consider using 'FsmBase'.
Rename class 'FSM' to match pascal case naming rules, consider using 'Fsm'.
Rename interface 'ILoggingFSM' to match pascal case naming rules, consider using 'ILoggingFsm'.
Rename interface 'IInternalSupportsTestFSMRef' to match pascal case naming rules, consider using 'IInternalSupportsTestFsmRef'.
